H0.text: The ingredients are the information most helpful to a person with allergies when selecting food products.

H1.text: The serving size is the information most helpful to a person with allergies when selecting food products.

H2.text: The nutritional information is the most helpful information to a person with allergies when selecting food products.

H3.text: The company that makes it is the most helpful information to a person with allergies when selecting food products.

A4.text: Food Allergen Labeling and Consumer Protection Act of 2004 requires companies to disclose on the label whether a packaged food product contains any of these eight major food allergens.

A5.text: The mainstay of treatment for food allergy is total avoidance of the foods identified as allergens.
